data: PED SUS Nicotine Replacement Therapy (NRT) (Module)
Patient Care
Pregnant or lactating patients need to have risks / benefits explained. Nicotine gum or inhaler recommended on a PRN basis. Patch, if used, should be removed at night
Communication Order
Monitor and assess closely for nicotine withdrawal symptoms, continued smoking or adverse effects
Conditional Order - Ongoing
If/when Nicotine Replacement Therapy is initiated, then remind patient to stop smoking or reduce smoking (as applicable)
Notify Treating Provider
Notify physician / nurse practitioner / pharmacist if further increase in NRT is required
Medications
For Vaping
The nicotine delivery varies greatly and is dependent upon many factors including the device used, the concentration of the e-liquid, user experience, puffing intensity, and technique
If concentration and amount known then consider a conversion of 1.1 to 1.8 mg of nicotine via vaping to be equivalent to 1 cigarette
If concentration and amount of vaping are unknown, start with nicotine 14 mg patch and "as needed therapy" and adjust dosage based on withdrawal symptoms
For patients who smoke less than 10 cigarettes per day OR weigh less than 45 kg:
nicotine 14 mg patch
1 patch, topical, qdaily, drug form: patch
For patients who smoke 10 or more cigarettes per day AND weigh greater than 45 kg:
nicotine 21 mg patch
1 patch, topical, qdaily, drug form: patch
PRN
Can be given as monotherapy or as an adjunct with patch therapy for cravings or withdrawal symptoms
For patients who smoke less than 25 cigarettes per day OR are using nicotine patch:
nicotine
2 mg, buccal, q1h, PRN nicotine withdrawal, drug form: gum
nicotine inhaler cartridge 10 mg cart
1 cartridge, inhalation, as directed, PRN nicotine withdrawal, drug form: cart
nicotine inhaler device
1 each, inhalation, once, drug form: device
For patients who smoke 25 or more cigarettes per day:
nicotine
4 mg, buccal, q1h, PRN nicotine withdrawal, drug form: gum
nicotine inhaler cartridge 10 mg cart
1 cartridge, inhalation, as directed, PRN nicotine withdrawal, drug form: cart
nicotine inhaler device
1 each, inhalation, once, drug form: device
